home.popularSubtitle: Materials most frequently studied by our users

popularMaterials.title: Basic Introduction to Mikrotik RouterOS
popularMaterials.description: Learn the basics of Mikrotik RouterOS, its interface, and main features to start your journey with Mikrotik.

popularMaterials.title: DHCP Server Configuration
popularMaterials.description: Learn how to set up a DHCP Server in Mikrotik for automatic IP distribution in your network.

popularMaterials.title: Bandwidth Management with Queue Tree
popularMaterials.description: Advanced techniques for bandwidth management using Queue Tree for more precise traffic control.

home.testimonialsSubtitle: Learning experiences from our platform users

testimonials.name: John Smith
testimonials.quote: This platform has been incredibly helpful in understanding Mikrotik from the basics. The materials are well-structured and easy to understand. I successfully obtained my MTCNA certification after learning here.

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.quote: As a beginner in the networking world, I found this platform extremely beneficial. The step-by-step tutorials made it easy for me to follow along and practice directly. Now I can configure Mikrotik routers with confidence.

testimonials.name: Michael Brown
testimonials.quote: Thanks to the bandwidth management tutorials on this platform, I successfully optimized the network in my internet cafe. Customers are more satisfied and revenue has increased. Thank you Learn Mikrotik!

home.ctaTitle: Ready to Become a Mikrotik Expert?
home.ctaSubtitle: Start your learning journey now and master Mikrotik with comprehensive and structured materials.

writing.intro: Guidelines for writing and contributing materials

guidelines.title: Writing Format
guidelines.description: Materials are written in Markdown format for ease of editing and consistency

guidelines.title: Content Structure
guidelines.description: Each material has a title, introduction, content, and conclusion

guidelines.title: Contribution
guidelines.description: You can contribute by submitting a pull request to our GitHub repository

guidelines.title: Language Style
guidelines.description: Use simple, clear, and easy-to-understand language

metadata.title: Frequently Asked Questions
metadata.description: How long does it take to respond to a question? Is there a discussion group for users? How do I report an error in the material?

questions.question: Do I need to have a Mikrotik device to learn?
questions.answer: Not necessarily. You can use simulators like GNS3 or VirtualBox for practice

questions.question: Is this material suitable for beginners?
questions.answer: Yes, the material is structured from the basics, making it suitable for beginners who have never used Mikrotik

questions.question: How long does it take to master Mikrotik?
questions.answer: Depending on the intensity of learning, usually 2-3 months to master the basics of Mikrotik

questions.question: Are there official Mikrotik certifications?
questions.answer: Yes, Mikrotik provides official certifications such as MTCNA, MTCRE, MTCINE, and others

questions.question: How can I contribute to the material?
questions.answer: You can contribute through GitHub by submitting pull requests or reporting issues

metadata.title: About Us
metadata.description: Get to know the Learn Mikrotik platform better

about.title: About Us
about.intro: Get to know the Learn Mikrotik platform better

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Our mission is to provide quality, structured, and easily accessible Mikrotik learning materials for everyone. We believe that computer networking knowledge, especially Mikrotik, should be accessible to anyone without barriers.

story.title: Our Story
story.description: Learn Mikrotik started in 2020 by a group of network engineers who saw the lack of structured and comprehensive Mikrotik learning resources in English. Starting from simple tutorials, we have now grown into a learning platform used by thousands of users worldwide.

members.name: Andy Wilson
members.bio: Over 10 years of experience in computer networking and holds MTCNA, MTCRE, and MTCINE certifications.

members.name: Bob Stewart
members.bio: Technical documentation specialist with a background in IT education.

members.name: Claire Davis
members.bio: Manages the community and ensures users get the support they need.

members.name: David Kennedy
members.bio: Expert in developing interactive learning content and network simulations.

list.title: Quality
list.description: We are committed to providing high-quality learning materials that are accurate and up-to-date.

list.title: Accessibility
list.description: We believe that education should be accessible to everyone, regardless of background or financial ability.

list.title: Community
list.description: We value the power of community and encourage collaboration and knowledge sharing.

list.title: Innovation
list.description: We continuously innovate in teaching methods and content delivery to enhance the learning experience.

metadata.title: Contact Us
metadata.description: Have questions or feedback? Don't hesitate to contact us.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.intro: Have questions or feedback? Don't hesitate to contact us.

form.name: Name
form.subject: Subject
form.success: Your message has been sent. We will contact you soon.
form.error: An error occurred. Please try again later.

questions.question: How long does it take to get a response to inquiries?
questions.answer: We strive to respond to all inquiries within 24 hours on business days.

questions.question: Is there a discussion group for users?
questions.answer: Yes, we have a Telegram group and discussion forum that can be accessed through the Community page.

questions.question: How do I report errors in the materials?
questions.answer: You can report errors through this contact form or through our GitHub repository.
